definition[0]: in a way that shows you think someone has done something wrong or dishonest
example[1]: ‘What do you want it for?’ he asked suspiciously.
definition[1]: in a way that makes people think that something bad or illegal is happening
example[2]: He saw two youths acting suspiciously.
example[3]: He seemed to be taking a suspiciously long time.
example[4]: This sounded suspiciously like an attempt to get rid of me.
definition[2]: in a way that shows you do not trust something or someone
